urls.title: Cuomo: Nursing homes 'don’t have the right to object' to order requiring admission of COVID-19 patients
urls.description: Governor announces statewide probe of nursing homes to make sure they are following emergency orders.

text: @RealJamesWoods I'm intrigued by the behavior of Governor Cuomo.  Why isn't this national news James? (hint-hint) https://t.co/F2kG21QRKx
